artefact.overview: Create a new petition, or search and sign other people's petitions to the UK government
artefact.more_information: To create or sign an e-petition, you must be a British citizen or a UK resident.
artefact.introduction: You can create a new petition (to support a cause or ask for a change in policy or the law), or search and sign other people's petitions. You'll need to give your name, email address and home address.
artefact.alternate_methods: You can still submit a paper petition to the House of Commons. Find out about the process of petitioning through an MP on the [UK Parliament](http://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/have-your-say/petitioning/ "Petitioning - UK Parliament"){:rel="external"} website.
